mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, title, content, mood, entry_date as entryDate, ai_sentiment_score as aiSentimentScore, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM diary_entries WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary_entries (user_id, title, content, mood, entry_date, ai_sentiment_score) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{mood}, #{entryDate}, #{aiSentimentScore})
